Reviews.Content: stayed frisatsun nights hotel trip la hotel la buzz hotel tick boxes plus rate offer prebooked advance upgraded executive double free wifi breakfast etc unlike previous reviews issues hotels decor parking charge assume hotel doesnt own parking structure reduced weekends direct link hotel restaurants nearby including cheesecake factory plus westfield shopping mall shops nearby impressed care attention afforded staff hotel particularly saturday sunday morning staff serving breakfast ladies stood engaged customers remembered coffee juice previous day complaint double bed definitely stay hotel similar

Reviews.Content: stayed hilton week aug 8th 14th hotel staff friendly clean oknot special stayed basic king picked hotel close conference okthere changed hotels staying night hilton pool free internet free night parking mini roomsso pick hotel restaurants close front door 12 block cheescake factory mortons bjs restaurant brewery starbucks jamba juice burger 1 block breakfast door hilton 6400 canoga floor office building suite 118 called sweet house cafe breakfasts eggs bagels fruit etc lunch kinds sandwiches 400 worth stop inexpensive check hilton hilton fine hotel dont frills thrills basic hotel lounge etci stay bring family

Reviews.Content: staying 12 days hotel beautiful hotel clean pay valet parking polite friendly fast front desk staff helpful directions etc restaurant empty dinner retaurants close block cheese factory consierges level snacks 5 9 breakfast nice viewthe house keeper little priced

Reviews.Title: “Not deserving of Hilton name”

Reviews.Content: hotel location immediately entering feel understated design substandard decor lack color decor asian origin whomever designed lobby color selections represent property found property outdated aspect lobby restaurant lounge updated location hotel front desk staff friendly bell staff purely average expect hilton uniform price hotel allow expect getting strongly suggest visiting hotel instead woodland hills hilton

Reviews.Title: “Nice Hotel with good room service!”
Reviews.Author: letstalktravel
Reviews.Content: saved 35 booking hotwire orig 125 saturday night checked late able 2 bed hassles 10th floor beds comfortable 4 pillows bed service till rosemary chicken yummy toiletries splendid enjoy weekend stay downfall pay parking 7 guest shared parking structure 6 buildings businesses

Reviews.Title: “The valet attendants service was great even though for the price of the rooms ,it should be complimentary”
Reviews.Author: ibari210
Reviews.Content: changed 3 times dayroom lights dysfunctional housekeeping attitude poor customer focused front desk answering phones 15 rings listening customers complimentary water free wifi day age poor customer focus stay valet attendants customers especially evening shift location ideal shopping gym

Reviews.Content: travel bit understand customer service hilton woodland hills california impressed positive attitude respectful treatment guests hotel clean amenities attitudes left fantastic memory trip february 2010 reflect hotel staff smile happy stayed june 2009 traveling chance stay
